"Xiemmy": "H-Hello there... Pleased to meet you. Are you... <%me>?"
"Ah, ummm... My name is Xiemmy. I'm a member of the Technological Development team."
"In order to better combat the increasingly stronger enemies we've been encountering, we seek to strengthen ARKS members as a whole."
"But, um... Well, I'd like to explain more in detail, so could you please visit me in person when you can?"
"It's good... to speak with you again. Xiemmy with the Technological Development team speaking."
"So, uhm... Don't you think that enemies have been getting increasingly stronger lately?"
"Well, you see... We're carrying out a plan to increase the strength of ARKS in general... So, if you're interested, would you mind come visiting me?"
